name: Clinica Oculistica, Ospedale Policlinico San Martino
goal:
integrating clinical care, medical training and research to improve population health outcomes and in particularly delivering regional and cross border specialist health care;
providing national and cross border medical training for students, specialist resident doctors and orthoptic/ophthalmic assistants including masters in rehabilitation
and carrying out research in ophthalmic diseases
interests: Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
EIP Active Health Ageing
European Directive for Cross Border Health Care 2011/24/EU;
EU legislation on substances of human origin (blood, tissues and cells, and organs)
Antimicrobial resistance
Training of healthcare professionals
Expert Group on Investment in Health (EXPH) on Innovative payment models; access to health; primary care assessment.
